name: Hill Climb Jeep: Racing Xtreme
description:
Hill Climb Jeep: Racing Xtreme!!!
Drift across the muddy tracks with other rival racers in this jeep rally racing game. Offroad drive requires great driving skills to fulfill your dangerous jeep racing dreams. Complete all the racing challenges in this crazy jeep rally race.
features:
- Selection of different Jeep
- Unique Challenging Levels
- Easy Smooth Control
- Explore Adventure Offroad Environment
- Cool Sound Effect
- Thrilling Game Play
- Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
